abstract.t: The Mobile Mesh Link Discovery Protocol (MMLDP) provides a media independent mechanism for discovering neighbors in a mobile adhoc network, and is capable of determining whether links are unidirectional or bidirectional. MMLDP is one protocol in a set of related Mobile Mesh protocols that also includes the Mobile Mesh Routing Protocol (MMRP) and the Mobile Mesh Border Discovery Protocol (MMBDP). Together, these protocols provide a flexible, extensible mobile adhoc networking capability.
